player-menu.title: Your game boards
rules.title: Game rules
rules.turn-system.title: Turn system
rules.turn-system.paragraph-1: Players who have made fewer moves have priority to play. This allows players with fewer moves to catch up with the others in terms of turns.
rules.turn-system.paragraph-2: If two or more players have the same number of turns, the playing order is determined by the order in which they joined the active game session.
rules.your-turn.title: Your turn
rules.your-turn.paragraph-1: If you haven't reached the Start tile for the second time yet, your turn begins with a dice roll.
rules.your-turn.paragraph-2: After rolling the dice, you will move forward the number of spaces shown.
rules.your-turn.paragraph-3: Next, you will complete an activity depending on the tile you landed on.
rules.your-turn.tiles.question-tile: <0>Question tile: </0>Answer a question to try to earn the indicated points.
rules.your-turn.tiles.senate-decisions: <0>Senate decisions: </0>Do the activity indicated on the Senate decisions card.
rules.your-turn.tiles.unlucky-tile: <0>Unlucky tile: </0>Answer a question to try to avoid losing the indicated points.
rules.your-turn.tiles.train-station: <0>Train station: </0>Watch the indicated content to receive the indicated points.
rules.your-turn.tiles.chance: <0>Chance: </0>Do the activity indicated on the Chance card.
rules.your-turn.tiles.library: <0>Library: </0>Answer a question from the previous row to try to earn the indicated points.
rules.your-turn.tiles.student-associatio: <0>Student association: </0>Answer a question from the previous row to try to earn the indicated points.
rules.your-turn.tiles.go-to-library: <0>Go to the library: </0>Answer a question to try to avoid going back to the library.
rules.your-turn.go: After reaching the Start tile for the second time, you will no longer roll the dice in your next turns. Instead, you will answer a random question from the board each turn to try to earn the indicated points.
rules.badges.title: Badges
rules.badges.paragraph-1: Throughout the game, you will have the opportunity to buy badges. Each badge has a cost and an associated multiplier.
rules.badges.paragraph-2: If you have enough points and buy a badge, the badge's cost will be deducted from your points. However, from that moment on, whenever the game awards you points, you'll receive them multiplied by the badge's multiplier value.
rules.badges.paragraph-3: If you have more than one badge, only the highest multiplier will be applied to the points you earn.
